    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<TransactionResponse>
    TransactionController.authorizeTransaction(Transaction transaction)
    Authorizes a transaction using the MCC to map the benefit category.
    org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<TransactionResponse>
    TransactionController.authorizeTransactionWithFallback(Transaction transaction)
    Authorizes a transaction with fallback to the CASH category if the MCC cannot be mapped or if the balance of the mapped category is not sufficient.
